definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: Zoar (understood as insignficance, cf. Ge 19:20);—Shlwr, LXXL Silwr, but Ge 13:10, Je 48:34 Zogor(a); on LXX cf. further Lag:BN 54 f.: city at SE. end of Dead Sea, [[חׂעַר]] Ge 13:10, Ge 14:2, Ge 14:8 (both = [[בֶּלַע]]) De 34:3, Is 15:5, Je 48:34; [[חוֹעַר]] Ge 19:22, Ge 19:30, Ge 19:30; c. [[ה]] loc., [[חׂ֫עֲרָה]] v:Ge 19:23 + Je 48:4 (for MT [[חעוריה]]), LXX Zalora, JDMich Ew Gf Gie al.—(cf. Buhl:Geogr. 271. 274 GASm:Geogr.506 f. 678 (App.).
